item.description:
Foxwoods Bingo —
one of the most popular pastimes in America — is only offered at Foxwoods.
The only place in New England where you can play high stakes bingo in the
comfort of a beautiful 3600 person capacity bingo hall — one of the
largest in the world.

Foxwoods Bingo March 18th Game starts at 10:30 a.m.

Please arrive no later than 10am, the doors open at 8am and it fills up
fast, the earlier we get there the better chance we have of all
staying together.

I am planning to get there early (well as early as is possible for
someone who is not a morning person) to try and save some seats.
Please let me know if anyone is able to go early as well.

The games should last until 2:30 p.m.  This is a super matinee day
with a pay out of about $1,199 each game.

Car pooling details to follow. Cost is $15.00, members get $5 off.

For more info contact Sarah @ SFritz2020@gmail.com
item.name: Bingo
